SmartGuard Models Documentation

Overview

The SmartGuard models implement a flexible, extensible questionnaire system designed for dynamic survey creation and management. The system leverages object-oriented design principles including inheritance, polymorphism, and multiple design patterns to provide type-safe, serializable question implementations.

Key Features

  • Polymorphic Question Types: Extensible hierarchy supporting different question implementations
  • JSON Serialization: Automatic bidirectional conversion between objects and JSON
  • Factory Pattern: Dynamic object creation based on question type detection
  • Builder Pattern: Fluent API for complex object construction
  • Template Method: Consistent serialization behavior across all question types
  • Type Safety: Compile-time guarantees through strong typing

System Architecture

graph TB
    subgraph "Application Layer"
        A[ORSG_Questionnaire]
    end
    
    subgraph "Question Management Layer"
        B[ORSG_QuestionDefault]
        C[ORSG_QuestionDetailFactory]
        D[ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder]
    end
    
    subgraph "Question Implementation Layer"
        E[ORSG_QuestionDetail]
        F[ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty]
        G[ORSG_QuestionDetailList]
        H[ORSG_QuestionDetailToggle]
    end
    
    subgraph "Supporting Types"
        I[ListOption]
        J[Enums]
    end
    
    A --> B
    B --> E
    C --> E
    D --> E
    E --> F
    E --> G
    E --> H
    G --> I
    B --> J
    G --> J

Class Hierarchy

classDiagram
    class ORSG_Questionnaire {
        +int Id
        +string Title
        +string Description
        +ORSG_QuestionDefault[] Questions
        +DateTime CreatedDate
        +DateTime ModifiedDate
        +bool IsActive
        +GetQuestionsBySection(section) ORSG_QuestionDefault[]
        +ValidateQuestionnaire() ValidationResult
        +CalculateProgress() float
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDefault {
        +int Id
        +string Section
        +int SectionOrder
        +int SeqNo
        +string Group
        +int GroupOrder
        +int GroupSeqNo
        +string Title
        +string Description
        +string DefaultTags
        +ORSG_QuestionDetail QuestionDetail
        +string QuestionDetailJson
        +int QuestionWeight
        +bool AllowOrdering
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDetail {
        <<abstract>>
        +QuestionType Type
        +ControlPosition Position
        #string DetailAsJson
        #GetSerializerOptions() JsonSerializerOptions
        +SerializeToJson() string
        +DeserializeFromJson(json)* ORSG_QuestionDetail
        +LoadContentsFrom(source)* ORSG_QuestionDetail
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty {
        +ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty()
        +DeserializeFromJson(json) ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty
        +LoadContentsFrom(source) ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDetailList {
        +ListOption[] Options
        +string Default
        +ListSelectionMode SelectionMode
        +ListControlType ControlType
        +ListDirection Direction
        +ORSG_QuestionDetailList()
        +DeserializeFromJson(json) ORSG_QuestionDetailList
        +LoadContentsFrom(source) ORSG_QuestionDetailList
    }

    class ListOption {
        +string Title
        +string Description
        +string Value
        +int Weight
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDetailFactory {
        <<static>>
        +CreateDetailFromJson(json) ORSG_QuestionDetail
        +GetTypeFromJson(json) QuestionType
    }

    class ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder {
        <<static>>
        +Empty() ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder
        +OfType(type) ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder
        +WithListOptions(options, default) ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder
        +Build() ORSG_QuestionDetail
    }

    ORSG_Questionnaire "1" --> "*" ORSG_QuestionDefault : contains
    ORSG_QuestionDefault "1" --> "1" ORSG_QuestionDetail : composition
    ORSG_QuestionDetail <|-- ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty : inherits
    ORSG_QuestionDetail <|-- ORSG_QuestionDetailList : inherits
    ORSG_QuestionDetailList "1" --> "*" ListOption : aggregation
    ORSG_QuestionDetailFactory ..> ORSG_QuestionDetail : creates
    ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder ..> ORSG_QuestionDetail : builds
